text: Wúlùn nǐmen yòng hánxù de yǔyán xiàng dài hūn de nǚrén qiúhūn, háishì jiāng nǐmen de qiúhūn zhī yì yǐncáng zài xīnzhōng [zhù], duì nǐmen dōu shì wú zuì de. Ān lā zhīdào, nǐmen bì jiāng sīniàn tāmen, dàn nǐmen bùyào tóng tāmen mìmì dìnghūnyuē, nǐmen yīng [àn jiào fǎ] shuō he lǐ dehuà. Zài tāmen shǒu wán guīdìng de dài hūn qíxiàn qián [yīnwèi dài hūn qíjiān fāxiàn huáiyùn de nǚrén, fēnmiǎn qián jìnzhǐ zàihūn], nǐmen bùyào [yǔ tāmen] quèdìng hūnyīn guānxì. Nǐmen dāng zhīdào, ān lā díquè zhīdào nǐmen xīnzhōng de yīqiè, suǒyǐ, nǐmen dāng jǐnfáng tā. Nǐmen dāng zhīdào, ān lā què shì zuì kuānshù de, zuì kuānróng de.
